segment.source: Search to see if a specific site already appears in your global Enterprise Mode site list.
segment.target: Search to see if a specific site already appears in your global Enterprise Mode site list.

segment.source: Search your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Search your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Search your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Search your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: You can search to see if a specific site already appears in your global Enterprise Mode site list so you don’t try to add it again.
segment.target: You can search to see if a specific site already appears in your global Enterprise Mode site list so you don’t try to add it again.

segment.source: From the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, type part of the URL into the Search box.
segment.target: From the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, type part of the URL into the Search box.

segment.source: The search query searches all of the text.
segment.target: The search query searches all of the text.

segment.source: For example, entering “micro” will return results like, www.microsoft.com, microsoft.com, and microsoft.com/images.
segment.target: For example, entering “micro” will return results like, www.microsoft.com, microsoft.com, and microsoft.com/images.

segment.source: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)
segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)

segment.source: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)
segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)

segment.source: Use the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Use the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
